Name: Fairy Card Rogue
About the game: *This game is a Touhou Project fangame. A roguelite where the dungeon changes and requires different strategies every time. Discern which of the many varied cards to use, and aim to reach the end of the dungeon! Nailing a combo for some real satisfaction! Explore a huge card pool to find cards well-suited to your personal adventure. Not experienced with roguelites? No problem! You can enter the dungeon with advantages by utilizing new features unlocked as you play! Aim for the top of the online rankings! Score challenges are are held with unique rules. Maybe you'll need to play differently than usual?
